Just finished watching this.  What a great movie!!!  Moves a little slow compared to your average hollywood trash these days but if you take the time to get into the mood and atmospere this one will definitely freak you out!  There's definitely some underlying social commentary going.  The best horror flicks have always done this and this one does it well.

this cut is the same as the original UK vhs release, not the directors cut (which is shorter). interestingly, a version has just been released in germany on dvd that runs 87mins, the same as the original US video release.

Actually this is the restored director's cut, not the original UK VHS release cut.

Quote from IMDb:
"Exists in several version's. The restored final director's cut runs 103 min."
